title: Dan Leek
text:
Dan Leek is an <a href="English%20people">English</a> former professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
Leek was educated at schools in <a href="Croydon">Croydon</a>, first, at the independent <a href="Laleham%20Lea%20Primary%20School">Laleham Lea Primary School</a>, followed by <a href="The%20John%20Fisher%20School">The John Fisher School</a>, which was a selective senior Roman Catholic School for boys during his time there, and was fondly known by the nicknames: "The Paralympic High-Jumper" and "Licorice Mick". He played rugby union a number of teams, most notably <a href="Wasps%20RFC">London Wasps</a> between 2001 and 2003. He became a coach at <a href="Beckenham%20RFC">Beckenham RFC</a> in 2012.
